latest_project.description: Together with my robotics team, I am currently working on the software of our robot for the 'wro future engineers' competition. This year we are planning on using a neuronal network to navigate the robot. As soon as the competition is over, I will open source the source code. The project really makes me learn new, super interesting things so far.

projects.title: Random Fact
projects.description: A website that gives you random facts, using the wikipedia api

projects.title: Find my
projects.description: A Program for an ESP32 to determine the position of a Bluetooth device to prevent the Device from getting left behind
